snippet: Christopher Leacock, the D.J., producer, label owner and member of Major Lazer, likes to decompress on his couch.
abstract: Steven Kurutz My Space column visits lively, sensory-stimulating  Washington Heights apartment of DJ, music producer and member of Major Lazer, Christopher Leacock--also known as Jillionaire.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Leacock, the D.J., producer, label owner and member of Major Lazer, likes to decompress on his couch.

headline.print_headline: Who Wants to Meet a Jillionaire?
headline.main: A Tour of D.J. Jillionaire’s Living Room in Washington Heights
